title: bootstrap mentions jsoup as wagon-http dependency, that's no longer true
body:
### Describe the bug

bootstrap mentions jsoup as wagon-http dependency, that's no longer true

This changed in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/commit/a342c5652677a17a1eaaf209628b4364cdb81251 when maven-wagon was updated to 3.5.1 and no longer pulls in jsoup dependency

See https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.maven.wagon/wagon-http-shared/3.5.1 and compare with previously used https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.maven.wagon/wagon-http-shared/3.4.3

At least the description in `independent-projects/bootstrap/pom.xml` needs to be adjusted
Maybe even revisited, because the exclude in docs module feels a bit fishy.

`git grep jsoup` gives this:
```
core/processor/pom.xml:            <groupId>org.jsoup</groupId>
core/processor/pom.xml:            <artifactId>jsoup</artifactId>
core/processor/src/main/java/io/quarkus/annotation/processor/generate_doc/JavaDocParser.java:import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
core/processor/src/main/java/io/quarkus/annotation/processor/generate_doc/JavaDocParser.java:import org.jsoup.nodes.Node;
core/processor/src/main/java/io/quarkus/annotation/processor/generate_doc/JavaDocParser.java:import org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode;
docs/pom.xml:            <groupId>org.jsoup</groupId>
docs/pom.xml:            <artifactId>jsoup</artifactId>
docs/pom.xml:                    <groupId>org.jsoup</groupId>
docs/pom.xml:                    <artifactId>jsoup</artifactId>
independent-projects/bootstrap/bom/pom.xml:                <groupId>org.jsoup</groupId>
independent-projects/bootstrap/bom/pom.xml:                <artifactId>jsoup</artifactId>
independent-projects/bootstrap/bom/pom.xml:                <version>${jsoup.version}</version>
independent-projects/bootstrap/pom.xml:        <jsoup.version>1.14.2</jsoup.version> <!-- wagon-http dependency -->
```


### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
